data.message: Hey I don't know if you even see this but my name is Thomas I have a disease called cystic fibrosis and I struggle everyday with it I'm in and out of the hospitals constantly and I was wondering if you could do a shout out and not for me but for everyone fighting this disease cause I used to feel so alone but I have some great people that's help me and I just want to get it known that they are not alone in their struggle that others have this disease and feel the same way i would appreciate it and I would like to give others hope to keep fighting the great fight we call life
